commit.message: SLIM-2196 updated model, added tests, reverted ConfigureDefinableLoadProfileCommandExecutor
SLIM-2196 change message model from ObisCodes to profileType, rename to proper message model

nodes.bodyText: Reduce the number of conditional operators (4) used in the expression (maximum allowed 3).
Reduce the number of conditional operators (4) used in the expression (maximum allowed 3).

commit.message: SLIM-2196 multiple return objects in PQ data
SLIM-2196 simplified GetPowerQualityProfileDtoConverter, some Sonar warnings

nodes.bodyText: mostly formatting, added one method: fromReferenceDateTime
Reduce this lambda expression number of lines from 24 to at most 20.

commit.message: SLIM-2196 update feature file to fix test
SLIM-2196 update feature file to fix test

nodes.bodyText:
Je test moet volgens mij dan beginnen als volgt:
Given a dlms device
| DeviceIdentification      | TEST1027000000001 |
| DeviceType                | SMART_METER_E     |
| Protocol                  | SMR               |
| ProtocolVersion           | 5.1               |
| Port                      | 1027              |
Ik zag dat je een bestaande test hebt aangepast. Ik ken niet alle details maar ik vermoed dat we voor zowel DSMR4.2 (TEST1024000000001) en SMR5 (TEST1027000000001) een test willen om de functionaliteit voor beide protocollen te waarborgen.
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -1,27 +1,22 @@
 @SmartMetering @Platform
-Feature: SmartMetering Bundle - GetProfileGenericData
-  As a grid operator
-  I want to be able to retrieve profile generic data from a meter via a bundle request
+Feature: SmartMetering Bundle - GetPowerQualityProfile
+  As a grid operator
+  I want to be able to retrieve power quality profile data from a meter via a bundle request
 
   Background: 
     Given a dlms device
       | DeviceIdentification | TEST1024000000001 |
       | DeviceType           | SMART_METER_E     |
 
-  Scenario: Retrieve profile generic data as part of a bundled request
+  Scenario: Retrieve power quality profile data as part of a bundled request

commit.message: SLIM-2196 disabled cucumber test while simulator is not ready yet, some code improvements
SLIM-2196 skiptest, added unit test for GetPowerQualityProfileCommandExecutor
SLIM-2196 removed obsolete profile generic data feature scenarios
